description: This file defines a utility class ProductMapper that provides static methods for converting between Product entities and their corresponding DTOs (ProductRequest and ProductResponse), as well as applying request data to an existing entity.

classes.name: ProductMapper
classes.description: Utility class providing static methods for converting Product entities to DTOs and vice versa, encapsulating mapping logic.

methods.name: toResponse
methods.description: Converts a Product entity to a ProductResponse DTO.

methods.name: toResponseList
methods.description: Converts a list of Product entities to a list of ProductResponse DTOs.

methods.name: applyRequest
methods.description: Updates an existing Product entity with fields from a ProductRequest.
